name: Space's Asteroid Blasters
description:
The classic asteroids game in colorful pre-rendered 3D graphics.

Play up with 4 players on the same pc. Cooperate to reach later levels and higher score, or maybe blast them off against an asteroid!
What out for flying saucers trying to shoot you. Shoot them instead to release a powerup.

The game can be played on keyboard, but using gamepads is recommended. Remember to configure controls on options menu.

Features:
Infinite levels
4 difficulty levels
Up to 4 players on the same pc
Skins
Chargable special ability
Did I mention a hidden mode?
